document.heading: Water and Sewer Authority Establishment and Department of Public Works Reorganization Act of 1996

history.narrative: Law 11-111, the “Water and Sewer Authority Establishment and Department of Public Works Reorganization Act of 1996,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 11-102, which was referred to the Committee on Public Works and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 7, 1995, and January 4, 1996, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 31, 1996, it was assigned Act No. 11-201 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 11-111 became effective on April 18, 1996.
